entry.title: a170. Dreamcatcher: Lunar Phases, Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: DZI Handmade
Type: Gifts
Price: 74.95

Dreamcatchers protect against nightmares by trapping bad dreams in their web, while good dreams are able to pass through with ease. Each part of the dreamcatcher represents a different phase of the moon.

These are great for people who may want to improve the quality and restfulness of their sleep, while also being beautiful decor items for any home. 

Handwoven in Nepal at a woman-owned production center and made from locally sourced cane, sustainably harvested yarns, natural cotton, and webbed with wax thread to be long-lasting. Approximately 40"h x 12"w.

entry.title: a166. Dreamcatcher: Hamsa
entry.summary:
Vendor: DZI Handmade
Type: Gifts
Price: 44.95

Dreamcatchers protect against nightmares by trapping bad dreams in their web, while good dreams are able to pass through with ease. The hamsa is a protective symbol said to bring good fortune, health, and happiness. This particular dream catcher features a gem at it's center and is adorned with peacock fathers. 

These are great for people who may want to improve the quality and restfulness of their sleep, while also being beautiful decor items for any home. 

Handwoven in Nepal at a woman-owned production center and made from locally sourced cane, sustainably harvested yarns, natural cotton, and webbed with wax thread to be long-lasting. Approximately 28"h x 12.5"w.
